Sentencas: Achieving reasonable performance in ceramic fuel cells at low operating temperatures is primarily hindered by the limitations of cathode properties.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Aiming to formulate a guideline for the selection of cathode materials, we compared the most representative high-performance low-temperature cathode materials: lanthanum strontium cobalt oxide (LSC), samarium strontium cobalt oxide (SSC), praseodymium barium strontium cobalt iron oxide (PBSCF), and barium strontium cobalt iron oxide (BSCF) over the same anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell platform.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The nanostructured LSC, SSC, PBSCF, and BSCF cathode layers were fabricated by pulsed laser deposition.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The PBSCF cathode material showed the highest performance owing to the low activation loss and low polarization resistance under biased conditions.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SSC exhibited the mildest degradation; however, its electrochemical performance was worse than those of LSC and PBSCF.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: LSC and PBSCF exhibited considerably high degradation rates, which were attributed to the surface composition alteration owing to strontium and/or barium segregation.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: At the same time, as-deposited BSCF exhibited significantly different microstructure from those of other cathode materials; it showed the worst performance and the fastest degradation as well, which was attributed to its composition and phase instability.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Although numerous issues still need to be solved for the practical application of these cathode materials, we expect that the results of the present study will provide a guideline for selecting and improving cathode materials for the low-temperature operation of ceramic fuel cells.
Titulo: Comparison of Various Cathode Materials Fabricated by Pulsed Laser Deposition for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells
